login_screen.go_to_settings_description: Biometric authentication not configured in this device. Please go to your device Settings to configure.
login_screen.in_your_client_area: In your Indexa Capital client area

profit_popup.twr_explanation: It's the best way to compare returns between different investment firms, as it ignores the timing of your purchases and sales.
profit_popup.mwr_explanation: It's the most common way to measure your portfolio's performance, as it takes into account your specific pattern of purchases and sales.
profit_popup.returns_calculated_net_of_fees: Returns are calculated net of fees.

expectations_popup.expectations_explanation:
Remember that these calculations are just expectations, and there's no guarantee or certainty that actual returns will end up within the specified range. We estimate there's a 95% chance that your returns will fall between the positive and the negative scenarios.

Keep in mind the markets can be volatile in the short term, but tend to revert to the mean and grow in the long term.

about_screen.text1: This app has been developed independently, and has no affiliation whatsoever with Indexa Capital.
about_screen.text2: To access your account data, the app uses the
about_screen.text4: provided by Indexa Capital. This API only allows read operations (GET methods), and thus cannot operate with your account or make any transactions on your behalf.
about_screen.text5: The app doesn't collect or store any account information, except for your access token if you choose to do so. The token is securely stored and encrypted in your local device, using the
about_screen.text6: library, and is only used to authenticate you against Indexa Capital servers.
about_screen.text7: You can delete the token from your device at any time by simply logging out.

logout_popup.title: Log out?
logout_popup.text: You'll need to enter your token again to log in
